body:
Yep, you read that correctly, I am Sulorak, also known as Michael, the person that's on the Teamspeak 24/7 yelling about houses being destroyed on Nebula and having pool parties wherever possible.  Now you can ask me questions, I'll answer just about anything.  




And don't forget to send me hate mail, this is the digital age.
Digit.
body_tagged:

And don't forget to send me hate mail, this is the digital age.
Digit.
title: Uh-Oh, not that creepy kid again.  (Sulorak)
